name: Original Ranch Spinach Dip
author: Hidden Valley Ranch
summary: This crowd-pleasing appetizer features a hollowed-out loaf of French bread filled with a creamy mixture of sour cream, spinach, water chestnuts, and Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Seasoning Mix.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) packet Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix
1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, rinsed, drained and chopped
Assorted, fresh vegetable sticks cut up for dipping
directions: Stir together dips mix, sour cream, spinach and water chestnuts
Chill 30 minutes or until just before serving
Cut top off the bread and remove center (using firm bread pieces as dippers)
Serve with cubed bread and vegetables
